item.description:
The Old Newbury Fire Department is having their annual Christmas Tree burning event, let's go join in on the fun!  The event is actualy at  Tendercrop Farm growing field but there is no parking there and they are saying to park at Spencer Little Farm.

For family fun:
A treasure hunt------------- Xmas tree toss
Toasting of Marshmellos----House Tours
Raffle Prizes-----------------Skating and Sleding (weather permitting)

Food etc:
Beer and Wine---------------Pizza, sausage and subs
Burgers and hot dogs-------Apple crisp
Hot cider, hot cocoa--------Fried dough

Admission: FREE!

Parking: $5.00 per car

This event is open to everyone.

This event will be scheduled on my 2 Meetup sites, (Our Circle of Friends and Connection & Friends) there may be more people going to this event then you see.

Take a minute now and put the Meetup phone into your phone, that way if you are are running late, can’t find us or need to cancel at the last minute, you already have it in your phone:  978-304-2811, please note this phone does not accept text messages.

Is it time for you to pay your dues?  Please look at your profile page where it states “Membership dues last recorded by your Organizer” You can pay your dues at any event.  Thank you in advance for paying your dues!

BAD Snow may cancel this event please remember to check back to see if we are still going to this event.

As a courtesy to everyone in the group come back to the event page and change your RSVP if your plans change or call me/send a message through the site.

Looking forward to seeing you at this event!

Donna
item.how_to_find_us: I will be in front of the house, if you can't find me call the Meetup cell FROM there we will go to the place that the bonfire is.
item.name: It's a Bonfire!!!
